languages.text: "Могу представить себе, какая грызня начнется за Торговый Патент... если потомки Винтерскейла пошли в него, династии грозит долгая междоусобица и кровавая баня".
"I can imagine the infighting that will break out over the Warrant of Trade... If Winterscale's descendants go to war with one another, the dynasty is in for a long feud and a bloodbath."
languages.original_text: "Могу представить себе, какая грызня начнется за Торговый Патент... если потомки Винтерскейла пошли в него, династии грозит долгая междоусобица и кровавая баня".

traits.locale_text: "I can imagine the infighting that will break out over the Warrant of Trade... if Winterscale's descendants go to war with one another, the dynasty is in for a long feud and a bloodbath."
"I can imagine the infighting that will break out over the Warrant of Trade... if Winterscale's descendants go to war with one another, the dynasty is in for a long feud and a bloodbath."
"I can imagine the infighting that will break out over the Warrant of Trade... if Winterscale's descendants go to war with one another, the dynasty is in for a long feud and a bloodbath."
"I can imagine the infighting that will break out over the Warrant of Trade... if Winterscale's descendants go to war with one another, the dynasty is in for a long feud and a bloodbath."

languages.text: “我可以想象，围绕贸易授状会爆发怎样的内讧……如果温特斯凯尔的子嗣自相残杀，那他的整个王朝就会陷入长期的世仇与血战之中。”
languages.original_text: "I can imagine the infighting that will break out over the Warrant of Trade... If Winterscale's descendants go to war with one another, the dynasty is in for a long feud and a bloodbath."

traits.locale_text: “我可以想象，围绕贸易许可证会爆发怎样的内讧……如果温特斯凯尔的子嗣自相残杀，那他的整个王朝就会陷入长期的世仇与血战之中。”

languages.text: « La lettre de marque risque de faire l'objet d'un certain nombre de luttes intestines... Si les descendants de la dynastie Winterscale partent en guerre les uns contre les autres, ça risque d'être un véritable bain de sang. »
languages.original_text: "I can imagine the infighting that will break out over the Warrant of Trade... If Winterscale's descendants go to war with one another, the dynasty is in for a long feud and a bloodbath."

traits.locale_text: « La lettre de marque risque de faire l'objet d'un certain nombre de luttes intestines... Si les descendants de la dynastie Winterscale partent en guerre les uns contre les autres, ça risque d'être un véritable bain de sang. »

languages.text: «Ya puedo imaginarme los conflictos internos que se desatarán por la Patente de Comercio... Si los descendientes de Winterscale marchan a la guerra entre ellos, a la dinastía le espera un baño de sangre».
languages.original_text: "I can imagine the infighting that will break out over the Warrant of Trade... If Winterscale's descendants go to war with one another, the dynasty is in for a long feud and a bloodbath."

traits.locale_text: «Ya puedo imaginarme los conflictos internos que se desatarán por la Patente de Comercio... Si los descendientes de Winterscale marchan a la guerra entre ellos, a la dinastía le espera un baño de sangre».

languages.text: 「貿易令状を巡って内輪もめが起こる事態が目に浮かびます…ウィンタースケールの後継同士が互いに争えば、あの王朝は長きにわたる確執を抱え流血沙汰にまみれるでしょうな」
languages.original_text: "I can imagine the infighting that will break out over the Warrant of Trade... If Winterscale's descendants go to war with one another, the dynasty is in for a long feud and a bloodbath."

traits.locale_text: 「貿易令状を巡って内輪もめが起こる事態が目に浮かびます…ウィンタースケールの後継同士が互いに争えば、あの王朝は長きにわたる確執を抱え流血沙汰にまみれるでしょうな」

languages.text: "Ich kann mir vorstellen, dass um den Handelsbrief ein interner Kampf ausbrechen wird ... Wenn Winterzunders Nachfahren in den Krieg gegeneinander ziehen, steht der Dynastie eine lange und blutige Fehde bevor."
languages.original_text: "I can imagine the infighting that will break out over the Warrant of Trade... If Winterscale's descendants go to war with one another, the dynasty is in for a long feud and a bloodbath."

traits.locale_text: "Ich kann mir vorstellen, dass um den Handelsbrief ein interner Kampf ausbrechen wird ... Wenn Winterzunders Nachfahren in den Krieg gegeneinander ziehen, steht der Dynastie eine lange und blutige Fehde bevor."

languages.original_text: "I can imagine the infighting that will break out over the Warrant of Trade... if Winterscale's descendants go to war with one another, the dynasty is in for a long feud and a bloodbath."

languages.text: "Ticari Ruhsatname yüzünden çıkacak iç çatışmaları hayal edebiliyorum. Winterscale'in torunları birbiriyle savaşırsa hanedanlık uzunca bir süre düşmanlık batağına gömülür, ortalık kan gölüne döner."
languages.original_text: "I can imagine the infighting that will break out over the Warrant of Trade... If Winterscale's descendants go to war with one another, the dynasty is in for a long feud and a bloodbath."

traits.locale_text: "Ticari Ruhsatname yüzünden çıkacak iç çatışmaları hayal edebiliyorum. Winterscale'in torunları birbiriyle savaşırsa hanedanlık uzunca bir süre düşmanlık ve kan gölünden kurtulamayacak."
